response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and bring substantial value to your business. The product, which I am confident you will find indispensable, is priced at $950,000. This figure reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the unique benefits it offers, making it a sound investment for your future success.

Given your expertise and the potential synergy between our respective goals, I am confident that this product will serve as a catalyst for growth and innovation within your organization. By accepting this offer, you will be positioning yourself at the forefront of industry advancements and securing a competitive edge in the market.

Please consider this proposal carefully, and should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you and contributing to your ongoing success.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
